name: Midterm Moments
description:
Controls

WASD or D PAD -  Move

A or ALT (OPTION for Mac) - Interact

CTRL or B - Back

SELECT - Enter

Midterm Moments is a short Visual Novel set in the early 2000s. 

Made for the Game Boy Showdown 2022 Game Jam hosted by Tronimal. Theme is Time.

Play as Primrose, an Elven college student, as she visits the Arbor University Library to study for her midterm exam.

The Library closes at 10 PM. You have 6 hours. What will you do with that time?

Will you socialize, play a game, or actually study? The choice is up to you!

Beautiful chiptune music by @robotmeadow (on twitter)!

'Food Frenzy' Mini Game scripted by my  hubby, Matt Hansen.

Made using GB Studio by Chris Maltby.

Also available for download to play in GB emulators.

A game made by Chloe Hansen, Toadstool Picnic, LLC 2022.
